text:
Even if Ultraviolet offered me their EV bike for free with a bow on top, lifetime charging, service and upgrades...I still wouldn‚Äôt take it. Sell it to someone who likes tech toys. I ride machines not experiments.
Let‚Äôs get brutally honest here..EV bikes like Ultraviolet are flashy, over glorified gadgets. They look good on paper and Instagram reels but in real world Indian conditions? They're a joke! Our roads, weather, dust and distances don‚Äôt care about your digital dashboard or futuristic LED lights ü§∑üèº‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

My 11 year old Royal Enfield Classic 500 which they don‚Äôt even make anymore...still dominates rough terrains like Ladakh, Himachal, Nepal and the Northeast without skipping a beat. It doesn‚Äôt need an update. It doesn‚Äôt panic if there‚Äôs no charger nearby. It doesn‚Äôt beg for software support or battery calibration. It just rides and roars. Every damn time üëçüç∫ These EVs? They're built for urban coffee shop crawls and weekend flexing not for people who actually live and breathe adventure. Battery anxiety is real. Charging stations are still inconsistent. And once your battery degrades and it will in 2‚Äì4 years in India‚Äôs heat. You‚Äôre left with a useless, overpriced e-brick. And good luck finding a mechanic for that in the middle of nowhere üòÇ
You can cover the whole of India with charging stations and I still won‚Äôt trade a real engine for a silent spin. Torque, reliability, control and soul that‚Äôs what makes a bike a machine. Not circuits and Bluetooth. So no I don‚Äôt want Ultraviolet, even for free ü§∑üèº‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è I want a bike that bleeds character, not a plastic spaceship with a progress bar üëç

text:
Urban company is the worst. I live in a metro city. I ordered native m1 on 19th , it got delivered on 21st. It was supposed to be installed on 22nd. After waiting for long period for so called "professional" to attend calls , he informed me that he had taken leave for the day for some reason. So the day of 22nd is wasted and after chatting with a bot for long time in their pathetic app I finally got a call from their customer care who gave me assurance that it will be installed on 23rd. On the 23rd I called the professional to know if he is coming or not. Everything was fine till the scheduled installation time. On the 23rd also the professional didn't show up. After chatting with him , he told that he is with his family visiting someplace.  I have no option other than rescheduling for 24th. On 24th the professional came and opened the box and it shows that the product is a refurbished/used product having several scratches and dents on body. On 26th I got call from urban company,  they asked for the damage pics , which I uploaded. They recommend for replacement, but I asked for return of the product. They confirmed that product will be returned with in 3 days. Still no confirmation of the same or no one has showed up for the same.

The product may be good and service may be prompt for a lot of people.  
But for me it is a disaster. And I don't have faith on a company which fails to deliver their promisses multiple times. 
Don't buy this.
